name: Lost Settlers
description:
Lost Settlers

This is a [brace yourself] small-minimalistic-peacuful-experimental RTS game. Explore the territory, discover new buildings and resources, and build your town up from nothing!

Controls:
 - WASD/Arrow keys to move cursor/menu 
 - Space/Num 0 to select
 - G to restart the game

PS:

This is a game in development - save function is not implemented, and it will take around 1 to 2 hours to complete. There is no final goal in the game, just take your time and, enjoy the process.

Feedback is greatly appreciated!
